# Assessment\

```{r include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(grid)
library(DT)

# Read data from specific sheet in excel
data1 <- read_excel("20232 OGA.xlsx", sheet = "STA404 KAM2283A")
data2 <- read_excel("20232 OGA.xlsx", sheet = "STA404 KAM2283B")
data3 <- read_excel("20232 OGA.xlsx", sheet = "STA404 KAC2205G")

# Omit columns 3
data1_new <- data1[, -c(3)]
data2_new <- data2[, -c(3)]
data3_new <- data3[, -c(3)]


# Format the last column to display only 2 decimal places
data1_new[,ncol(data1_new)] <- round(data1_new[,ncol(data1_new)], 2)
data2_new[,ncol(data1_new)] <- round(data2_new[,ncol(data2_new)], 2)
data3_new[,ncol(data1_new)] <- round(data3_new[,ncol(data3_new)], 2)
```
